components.name: SpecialCheckboxComponent
components.templateData: {{ control.label }} {{ control.icon }} {{ control.placeholder }}

components.name: SpecialDatepickerComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  *ngIf="control"
  [id]="control.elementId"
  class="w-full {{ control.styleClasses }}"
  [appearance]="control.label ? 'outline' : 'standard'"
>
  <mat-label *ngIf="control.label">{{ control.label }}</mat-label>
  <input
    matInput
    autocomplete="off"
    [readonly]="control.readOnly"
    [matDatepicker]="picker"
    [required]="control.required"
    [placeholder]="control.placeholder"
    [formControl]="control"
  />
  <mat-datepicker-toggle matSuffix [for]="picker"></mat-datepicker-toggle>
  <mat-datepicker #picker startView="year" [startAt]="startAt">
  </mat-datepicker>
  <mat-hint>
    {{ control.tooltip }}
  </mat-hint>
  <mat-error>
    {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: SpecialDropdownComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  *ngIf="control"
  [id]="control.elementId"
  class="w-full {{ control.styleClasses }}"
  [appearance]="control.label ? 'outline' : 'standard'"
>
  <mat-label *ngIf="control.label">
    {{ control.label }}
  </mat-label>
  <mat-select
    [formControl]="control"
    [required]="control.required"
    (selectionChange)="optionSelected($event.value)"
    [placeholder]="control.placeholder"
  >
    <mat-option *ngIf="!control.required" [value]="null">
      {{ control.placeholder || control.settings.notSelectedText }}
    </mat-option>
    <mat-option
      *ngFor="let item of control.settings.source | async"
      [value]="item[control.settings.fieldId]"
    >
      {{ item | textByFunction: control.settings.fieldName }}
    </mat-option>
  </mat-select>
  <button
    *ngIf="settings.icon"
    mat-icon-button
    matSuffix
    (click)="iconClick($event)"
  >
    <mat-icon>
      {{ settings.icon }}
    </mat-icon>
  </button>
  <mat-icon *ngIf="control.icon" matPrefix>{{ control.icon }}</mat-icon>
  <mat-hint *ngIf="control.tooltip">{{ control.tooltip }}</mat-hint>
  <mat-error>
    {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: SpecialFormComponent
components.templateData: {{ form.label }}

components.name: SpecialInputComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  *ngIf="control"
  [id]="control.elementId"
  class="w-full {{ control.styleClasses }}"
  [appearance]="control.label ? 'outline' : 'standard'"
>
  <mat-label *ngIf="control.label">{{ control.label }}</mat-label>
  <input
    matInput
    (blur)="onBlurAction()"
    (keydown.enter)="onEnterClick()"
    [inputMask]="settings?.mask"
    autocomplete="off"
    [type]="settings?.type || 'text'"
    [readonly]="control.readOnly"
    [required]="control.required"
    [placeholder]="control.placeholder"
    [formControl]="control"
  />
  <mat-icon *ngIf="control.icon" matPrefix>{{ control.icon }} </mat-icon>
  <mat-hint>
    {{ control.tooltip }}
  </mat-hint>
  <button
    *ngIf="settings?.icon"
    mat-icon-button
    matSuffix
    (click)="iconClick($event)"
  >
    <mat-icon>
      {{ settings.icon }}
    </mat-icon>
  </button>
  <mat-error>
    {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: SpecialLabelComponent
components.templateData:
{{control.label}}
{{ control.value | textByFunction: control.settings.pipe}}

components.name: SpecialMultipleAutocompleteComponent
components.templateData:
{{ control.label }}
{{ option | textByFunction: settings.fieldName }}
{{ control.icon }} {{ control.tooltip }} {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
{{ chip | textByFunction: settings.fieldName }} cancel

components.name: SpecialTextAreaComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  *ngIf="control"
  [id]="control.elementId"
  class="w-full {{ control.styleClasses }}"
  [appearance]="control.label ? 'outline' : 'standard'"
>
  <mat-label *ngIf="control.label">{{ control.label }}</mat-label>
  <textarea
    cdkTextareaAutosize
    #autosize="cdkTextareaAutosize"
    cdkAutosizeMinRows="1"
    cdkAutosizeMaxRows="5"
    matInput
    (blur)="onBlur.emit(control.value)"
    (keydown.enter)="onEnter.emit(control.value)"
    [type]="control.settings?.type || 'text'"
    [readonly]="control.readOnly"
    [required]="control.required"
    [placeholder]="control.placeholder"
    [formControl]="control"
  ></textarea>
  <mat-icon *ngIf="control.icon" matPrefix>{{ control.icon }} </mat-icon>
  <mat-hint>
    {{ control.tooltip }}
  </mat-hint>
  <mat-error>
    {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: SpecialUploadComponent
components.templateData:
{{ control.icon }}

{{ control.label }}

{{ control.placeholder }}

{{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}

variables.name: currencyInputMask
variables.defaultValue:
createMask({
  alias: 'numeric',
  groupSeparator: ',',
  autoUnmask: true,
  digits: 2,
  digitsOptional: false,
  prefix: '$ ',
  placeholder: '0',
})

variables.name: EnumToArray
FieldBasicData
variables.defaultValue:
{
  placeholder: 'Placeholder',
  label: 'Label',
  tooltip: 'Tooltip',
  icon: 'accessible',
  elementId: 'Element-id',
  styleClasses: '',
  length: 0,
  required: true,
  readOnly: false,
  errorMessages: {},
  asyncValidators: null,
  validators: null,
}

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special autocomplete control',
  template: `
  <spf-form-control-viewer
    (getData)="getData($event)"
    [theme]="theme"
    [autocomplete]="{
      placeholder: placeholder,
      label: label,
      tooltip: tooltip,
      icon: icon,
      elementId: elementId,
      styleClasses: styleClasses,
      length: 0,
      required: required,
      hidden: false,
      readOnly: readOnly,
      defaultValue: defaultValue,
      errorMessages: errorMessages,
      type:type,
      settings:{
        fieldId: fieldId,
        fieldName:fieldName,
        source:source
      }
    }"
    >
  </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.autocomplete,
    getData: action('Get data'),
  },
})

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special checkbox control',
  template: `
    <spf-form-control-viewer
      [theme]="theme"
      [field]="{
        placeholder: placeholder,
        label: label,
        tooltip: tooltip,
        icon: icon,
        elementId: elementId,
        styleClasses: styleClasses,
        length: length,
        defaultValue:defaultValue,
        required: required,
        hidden: false,
        type:type,
        readOnly: readOnly,
        settings:{
          labelPosition:labelPosition,
          indeterminate:indeterminate
        },
        errorMessages: errorMessages
      }"
      >
    </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.checkbox,
  },
})

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special input control',
  template: `
    <spf-form-control-viewer
      [theme]="theme"
      [field]="{
        placeholder: placeholder,
        label: label,
        tooltip: tooltip,
        icon: icon,
        elementId: elementId,
        styleClasses: styleClasses,
        length: length,
        defaultValue:defaultValue,
        required: required,
        hidden: false,
        readOnly: readOnly,
        type:type,
        settings:{},
        errorMessages: errorMessages
      }"
      >
    </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.date,
  },
})

variables.name: Template
Template
variables.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special dropdown control',
  template: `
  <spf-form-control-viewer
    [theme]="theme"
    [dropdown]="{
      placeholder: placeholder,
      label: label,
      tooltip: tooltip,
      icon: icon,
      elementId: elementId,
      styleClasses: styleClasses,
      length: length,
      required: required,
      hidden: false,
      readOnly: readOnly,
      defaultValue:defaultValue,
      type:type,
      errorMessages: errorMessages,
      settings:{
        source:source,
        fieldId: fieldId,
        fieldName:fieldName,
        notSelectedText:notSelectedText
      }
    }"
    >
  </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.dropdown,
  },
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/core/mask.name: currencyInputMask
projects/special-forms/src/lib/core/mask.defaultValue:
createMask({
  alias: 'numeric',
  groupSeparator: ',',
  autoUnmask: true,
  digits: 2,
  digitsOptional: false,
  prefix: '$ ',
  placeholder: '0',
})

(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special autocomplete control',
  template: `
  <spf-form-control-viewer
    (getData)="getData($event)"
    [theme]="theme"
    [autocomplete]="{
      placeholder: placeholder,
      label: label,
      tooltip: tooltip,
      icon: icon,
      elementId: elementId,
      styleClasses: styleClasses,
      length: 0,
      required: required,
      hidden: false,
      readOnly: readOnly,
      defaultValue: defaultValue,
      errorMessages: errorMessages,
      type:type,
      settings:{
        fieldId: fieldId,
        fieldName:fieldName,
        source:source
      }
    }"
    >
  </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.autocomplete,
    getData: action('Get data'),
  },
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special text area control',
  template: `
    <spf-form-control-viewer
      [theme]="theme"
      [field]="{
        placeholder: placeholder,
        label: label,
        tooltip: tooltip,
        icon: icon,
        elementId: elementId,
        styleClasses: styleClasses,
        length: length,
        defaultValue:defaultValue,
        required: required,
        hidden: false,
        readOnly: readOnly,
        disabled: disabled,
        type: type,
        errorMessages: errorMessages
      }"
      >
    </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.textArea,
  },
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.name: Template
projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special upload control',
  template: `
    <spf-form-control-viewer
      [theme]="theme"
      [field]="{
        placeholder: placeholder,
        label: label,
        tooltip: tooltip,
        icon: icon,
        elementId: elementId,
        styleClasses: styleClasses,
        length: length,
        defaultValue:defaultValue,
        required: required,
        hidden: false,
        readOnly: readOnly,
        type: type,
        settings: {
          accept: accept,
          multiple: multiple
        },
        errorMessages: errorMessages
      }"
      >
    </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.upload,
  },
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/core/util.name: EnumToArray
